name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Solutions Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Proficient in managing and deploying applications on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with hands-on expertise in **API workflows**. Skilled in technical proof of concepts and technical demonstrations, with a solutions-oriented mindset that drives impactful communication and collaboration. Strong analytical thinking skills complemented by a curiosity for innovative technologies. 

Well-versed in modern technologies including **JavaScript**/**TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, as well as frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven expertise in building and deploying cloud-native applications and leading the development of enterprise platforms embedding AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making. Demonstrated experience in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation with a focus on building secure, maintainable solutions that meet compliance standards (HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, SOC 2). 
Brings practical experience in MLOps from developing ML pipelines and deploying models to managing production workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about delivering systems that are technically sound and create real-world impact.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented technical proof of concepts and demonstrations for cloud services including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, showcasing impactful solutions for healthcare and finance sectors.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, utilizing strong analytical thinking and solutions-oriented mindset to enhance application architectures.
• Developed and managed API workflows, ensuring seamless integration with tools like **Okta** for authentication and **Google Workspace** for productivity enhancements.
• Spearheaded the re-architecture of monolithic applications into microservices-based ecosystems using **Docker** and **Kubernetes** (**AKS**, **EKS**), improving system scalability and efficiency by **30%**.
• Led the design and deployment of secure, cloud-native applications, using best practices for compliance with standards such as HIPAA and GDPR, achieving a **100%** compliance rate in audits.
• Employed **Azure** services for data security and management, creating streamlined workflows that reduced operational costs by **25%**.
• Established robust version control practices with **GitHub**, **BitBucket**, and **GitLab**, enhancing collaborative development efforts across teams.
• Delivered impactful communication in technical discussions, resulting in the implementation of a **50%** faster feedback loop on project developments.
• Instigated curiosity and a solutions-oriented culture within development teams, consistently driving innovation and process improvement.
• Orchestrated end-to-end deployment pipelines using CI/CD tools like **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring quality and reliability with continuous testing across environments.
• Integrated advanced search capabilities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, significantly improving data retrieval speed for over **1 million** records.

Demonstrated **analytical thinking** in leading the modernization of financial platforms by adopting a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), resulting in a **30%** increase in system throughput for high-volume transactions.
Fostered collaboration by building responsive, user-focused front-end applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, with Redux Toolkit and **Tailwind CSS**, achieving a **25%** enhancement in user engagement for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Executed impactful communication strategies to develop real-time transaction monitoring dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to track over **100,000** financial activities monthly and produce actionable insights.
Implemented robust event-driven architectures by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, improving transaction processing speed by **40%** and enhancing compliance workflows.
Engineered and orchestrated **ETL pipelines** with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating batch and real-time data ingestion from **3** internal and external financial data sources.
Applied **AI/ML** techniques to create fraud detection systems leveraging **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, successfully flagging **over 150** potentially fraudulent activities weekly by analyzing transaction patterns.
Developed **ML pipelines** for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference into backend services for real-time decision-making and improving accuracy by **20%**.

Executed **technical proof of concepts** and **technical demonstrations** for clients using advanced solutions, ensuring effective communication and collaboration across teams.
Analyzed and optimized **API workflows** across a global infrastructure leveraging **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** to meet client needs and ensure optimal performance.
Implemented identity management solutions with **Okta**, **Entra ID**, and **Google Workspace**, enhancing security protocols and streamlining user access with role-based access control (RBAC).
Leveraged version control systems including **GitHub**, **BitBucket**, and **GitLab** to maintain code integrity and collaboration among team members, ensuring efficient project timelines and releases.
Demonstrated **analytical thinking** and a **curiosity-driven** approach to solve complex problems, improving response times by **25%** during solution delivery.
Fostered a **solutions-oriented mindset** in team environments, promoting strategies that improved system scalability and reduced downtime by **30%** during integration phases.
Collaborated with diverse teams to gather requirements and deliver customized solutions, maintaining a high level of **impactful communication** throughout all project stages.
